TopicTitle: Reverting flight causes KSP to freeze or gives me grey screen.

Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25 mac 64-bit

Problem: When I try to revert a flight, KSP freezes up or gives me a grey screen.

Mods Installed:

AnimatedDecouplers

AutoAsparagus

CrossFeedEnabler

Firespitter

KarbonTech (Apollo style command module)

Klockeed Martian Special Parts

Lionhead Aerospace, Inc. (Circular Solar Panels)

MechJeb 2

MechJeb 2 Embedded Universally

ModuleManager 2.5.1

NearFuturePropulsion

NearFutureSolar

NearFutureSpacecraftParts

ProceduralFairings

ProceduralParts

RealChute

SDHI

TweakScale

Reproduction Steps:

1. Install all the mods I have

2. Build a rocket

3. Try to revert

4. KSP freezes

Log:

Too long to add so find it here

EDIT:

Sorry that the link didn't work, this one will work

Edited November 1, 2014 by SpaceLaunchSystem

Could you upload the log to a website like Dropbox or Google Drive? We can't access files on your computer.

Also, what versions of each of those mods do you have installed?

Do you mean you have a 64-bit processor, or did you set up the 64-bit Mac KSP hack?
Sorry. I installed the 64-bit version of Ksp 0.25

Sorry. I installed the 64-bit version of Ksp 0.25

That's the community hack for Mac? Or a Linux or Windows 64-bit version. (The only official KSP for Macs in 32-bit).

In any case, the KSP.log doesn't show much of anything. Could you upload your Player.log? Location details in this sticky.

I'm sorry, I got confused. I was looking at the wrong information. I have the 32-bit version. Where is the player.log?

EDIT: Nevermind, I found my Unity player.log, find it here.

Edited November 1, 2014 by SpaceLaunchSystem

You're running out of memory:

KSP(2194,0xa11a31a8) malloc: *** mach_vm_map(size=4198400) failed (error code=3)

*** error: can't allocate region

*** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug

KSP(2194,0xa11a31a8) malloc: *** mach_vm_map(size=4194304) failed (error code=3)

*** error: can't allocate region

*** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug

Receiving unhandled NULL exception

Active Texture Management (regular, not basic) should be enough to prevent the freezes.

you're running out of memory:

active texture management (regular, not basic) should be enough to prevent the freezes.

ksp(2194,0xa11a31a8) malloc: *** mach_vm_map(size=4198400) failed (error code=3)

*** error: Can't allocate region

*** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug

ksp(2194,0xa11a31a8) malloc: *** mach_vm_map(size=4194304) failed (error code=3)

*** error: Can't allocate region

*** set a breakpoint in malloc_error_break to debug

receiving unhandled null exception

thank you!!!!
